vrrp-groups.description: VRRP groups of this interface, the max group number is 255 per interface.

group-id.description: Virtual Router ID which identifies the virtual router, range from 1 to 255

learn-mode.description: Whether learn advertisement interval from packet, default is configure mode.

priority.description: VRRP priority, configured from 1 to 254. Higher values equal higher priority, the default value is 100, 0 and 255 are reserved for special using. 0 means Master quit, 255 means IP address owner when VRRP IP is equal to IP on interface.

auth-type.description: VRRP authentication type, default value is No Authentication. Simple text authentication is only supported when VRRP version is 2.

auth-string.description: VRRP authentication text when auth-type is simple-text, it must be the same within VRRP Routers.

value-in-sec.description: Time interval between ADVERTISEMENTS, unit is second

value-in-msec.description: Time interval between ADVERTISEMENTS, unit is millisecond

out-intf-send-mode.description: Send mode of VRRP out-interface, send from all out interfaces by default.

admin-group-type.description:
There are 3 group types: normal group - which state is determined by itself, member group - which state is determinedby it's owner and owner group - which determines members' state.

This leaf value should be owner for owner group; it should be not-owner for normal and member group, if admin-group-intf-name and admin-group-id are not set, it is a normal group; if admin-group-intf-name and admin-group-id areset, it is a member group.

accept.description: Controls whether a virtual router in Master state will accept packets addressed to the address owner's IPvX address as its own if it is not the IPvX address owner, the default value is accept.

check-ttl.description: If check TTL is 255 in advertisement, the default value is check.

preempt.description: VRRP preempt mode. Controls whether a higher-priority Backup router preempts a lower-priority Master router. Values are Enable to allow preemption and Disable to prohibit preemption.  Default is Enable.

preempt-delay.description: Preempt delay time, range from 0 to 3600(s). If it's zero,higher-priority Backup preempt immediately, otherwise, it preempts after delayed this interval, the default value is 0.

reload-delay.description: Reload delay time after interface is up and VRRP restart, if it's zero, VRRP restart immediately, otherwise VRRP restart after the delay time, the default value is 0.

backup-route.description: If Backup router is enabled to forward, the default value is disable.

work-mode.description: VRRP work mode. The default mode is Standard which works according to RFC, only one router is forwarding in one VRRP group. Load-balance mode is an extension, it provides traffic balancing in one VRRP group.

arp-na-interval.description: The interval of sending free ARP or NA packet periodically, range from 1 to 3600(s), default: 60 seconds.

vrrp-ipv4-address.description: Virtual addresses, including primary and secondary addresses

vrrp-ipv6-address.description: Virtual addresses, including primary and secondary addresses

track-intfs.description: VRRP track interfaces, the max number is 64 per group.

track-intf.description: Track interface, adjusting priority and re-electing Master according to the interface state

policy.description: Track interface policy, 1:priority-down, 2:rapid-down, priority is down to 1, and Master send 0-priority advertisement

priority-value.description: Decreased priority value, range from 1 to 254, the default value is 10

track-samgrs.description: VRRP track samgr, the max number is 10 per group.

track-samgr.description: Track samgr object or group, re-elect Master according to other detection

priority-value.description: Decreased priority value, range from 1 to 254, the default value is 10

out-interfaces.description: VRRP out interfaces for sending Advertisement, the max number is 3 per group.

out-intf.description: The out-interfaces sent advertisement, 3 interfaces can be configured.

out-intf-name.description: The out-interface names, 3 interfaces can be configured.

forwarder-id.description: Forwarder owner ID represent one Virtual Forwarder which is in charge of the forwarding for one Virtual MAC

weight.description: Forwarder weight of this device, range from 1 to 255. Higher values equal higher ability, the default value is 100

low-weight.description: If forwarder weight is lower than this value, the router is not able to forward any longer, the default value is 1.

forwarder-preempt.description: VRRPE forwarder preempt mode. Controls whether a higher-priority Virtual Forwrader preempts a lower-priority forwarder. Values are Enable to allow preemption and Disable to prohibit preemption.  Default is Enable.

forwarder-preempt-delay.description: Preempt delay time, range from 0 to 3600(s). If it's zero, higher-priority Virtual Forwrader preempt immediately, otherwise, it preempts after delayed this interval.

redirect-time.description: Redirect time, range from 1 to 3600(s). After the router corrupted which in charge of one Virtual Forwarder, other router take it over, and after redirect time interval, the Virtual MAC of this Virtual Forwarder is not dilivered an longer.

time-out-mode.description: After the router corrupted which in charge of one VirtualForwarder, other router take it over, and after time out interval, the Virtual Forwarder will be deleted. If it's configured to be time-out-disbaled, Virtual Forwarder will never be deleted.

time-out.description: Time out interval before Virtual Forwarder is deleted, range from 600 to 64800(s), the default value is 14400s.

policy.description: Load balance policy, 1:round-robin, 2:weighted, 3:host-dependent, the default value is round-robin.

vf-track-intfs.description: Virtural Forwarder track interfaces, the max number is 64 per forwarder.

vf-track-intf.description: Track interface, adjusting priority and re-electing Active forwarder according to the interface state

weight-value.description: Decrement weight value, range from 1 to 254, the default value is 10

vf-track-samgrs.description: Virtural Forwarder track samgr, the max number is 10 per forwarder.

vf-track-samgr.description: Track samgr object or group, re-elect Active forwarder according to other detection

weight-value.description: Decreased priority value, range from 1 to 254, the default value is 10

last-change-systime.description: The recent time of state changing, eg:2015-04-07 13:26:35.
